head.title: Metro Briefing | New York: Brooklyn: Skeletal Remains Found

hedline.hl1: Metro Briefing | New York: Brooklyn: Skeletal Remains Found

body.head.byline: By Michael Wilson (NYT); Compiled by Anthony Ramirez

abstract.p: Human skeletal remains are found by worker cleaning highway overpass in Brooklyn where homeless people sleep; there are no obvious signs of foul play (M)

block.p: Human skeletal remains were found by a worker cleaning a remote corner of a highway overpass in Brooklyn yesterday, the police said. The remains were in a seated position in a wooded area against the wall of the Highland Boulevard overpass crossing the Jackie Robinson Parkway, where homeless people sometimes sleep. The medical examiner's office will examine the remains today, a spokeswoman said. An investigator said that there was no obvious sign of foul play.
